Con esta cantidad dinero comprará una vaca lechera para tener cada día más producción de leche para vender.
texts.en:
Digna is 36 years old and lives with her two children. She works with great energy and spirit every day in order to get ahead. Her business is raising animals, specifically cows, whose milk she sells daily. They yield an average of ten liters (2.6 gallons) of milk per day, which provides her a regular income.

During the week, Digna attends a gas pump very near her home, which allows her to watch her children. On the weekends, she sells her animals. She has done these jobs for twelve years and, as she enjoys being busy, she is very satisfied with her work.

This is Digna's second loan with Kiva's partner MFP, and she has demonstrated responsibility and punctuality. With this loan, Digna will purchase another cow to increase her daily sales of milk.

Translated from Spanish by Kris Vickery, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: To purchase a cow

loans.name: Magda Veronica

texts.es: La Sr. Magda tiene 31 años de edad, habitante del barrio tierra prometida, en la capital de Managua, casada su esposo trabaja como contratista de construcción el cual es trabajo agotador pero se gana bien, es una ayuda económica mas para la casa, tiene dos hijos de 9 y 11 años de edad, lo cuales estudian actualmente. Sus planes es crear un futuro mejor económico y social para sus hijos. Doña Magda se desempeña como vendedora de cosmético, zapatos, ropa y prendas, inicio su negocio con ingreso propios ya son ochos  años en el campo de venta lo cuales son de crecimiento y aumento de utilidad. Sus objetivos en corto plazo es la construcción de su casa, en un porche  lo cual comprara materiales de construcción como: piedra, arena, cemento, hierro para darle seguridad a su negocio y familia.  Agracias a los prestamos de Afodenic  lograra tener una vivienda digna para su familia
texts.en:
Magda is 31 years old and lives in the Tierra Prometida ("Promised Land") neighborhood of Managua, the capital of Nicaragua. She is married, and her husband works as a contractor; the work is exhausting but pays well and is a good way to support the family. The couple has two children, who are 9 and 11 years old and are both currently in school. Their plan for the future is to create a better social and economic future for their children. Magda sells cosmetics, shoes, and clothing. She started the business with her own income, and now has eight years of experience. Over those years, she has expanded the business. Her short-term goal is to finish building her home by adding a porch. She will use her loan to buy construction materials like stones, sand, cement, and iron rods to keep her family and her business safe. Thanks to loans from Afrodenic, Magda will have a proper home for herself and her family.

Translated from Spanish by Cynthia McMurry, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Buy construction materials to finish building her house

loans.name: Domitila

texts.es: Domitila tiene 31 años, vive con su esposo y sus 2 hijos. Desde hace 10 años instaló una tienda en su propia casa, aprovechando la ubicación  comercial que tiene esta, ya que por ahí siempre pasan los transportistas de taxi, así como sus vecinos, por ser un punto central de su zona, es así que ella atiende todos los días desde la mañana hasta la tarde y las ventas que se ha propuesto las ha superado, por lo que está  muy animada de continuar con su negocio, con el que obtiene los ingresos que le permiten solventar los gastos de su familia, y esa es la mejor satisfacción que ella puede tener. Es la segunda vez que Domitila solicita un préstamo con MFP, y es una de las clientas más puntuales de su banco comunal. Con esta cantidad podrá adquirir mayor cantidad mercadería que le permitirá tener más ganancias, comprará cerveza, sacos de arroz, azúcar y también menestras.
texts.en:
Domitila is 31 years old and lives with her husband and 2 children. Ten years ago she opened a store in her home, taking advantage of her location as there are always taxis passing, as well as neighbours, as she is centrally located. Thus she tends to her clientele daily from morning 'til night and sales have surpassed her expectations. She is very excited to continue building her business with which she makes enough money to cover her household costs, which is the greatest satisfaction she can know. This is the second time Domitila has requested a loan from MFP, and she is one of the most punctual clients in her community bank. With this loan she will be able to acquire more merchandise, allowing her to make greater profits. Specifically, she will buy beer, bags of rice and sugar as well as other typical foods. .

Translated from Spanish by Laure Kwon, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: To buy merchandise for her store

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: To invest in a variety of beauty products for her small business

loans.name: Guisela

texts.es: Guisela tiene 26 años, vive con su hijo de 6 años y su madre. Se dedica a la venta de animales, ganado vacuno y ovino, en las principales ferias ganaderas de su zona, ella está muy contenta porque ya son 4 años que se viene dedicando a esta actividad que le permite dar el sostén necesario a su pequeño hijo que es la razón de su esfuerzo, por ello que no se cansa de buscar a los mejores animales que garantizaran sus mejores ganancias, cuando no hay venta mantiene a sus animales en su establo por unos días y trata de que engorden, porque de ello depende la cotización. Es la segunda vez que Guisela está solicitando un préstamo con MFP, por lo que se compromete a seguir siendo puntual con sus pagos, como lo viene haciendo hasta ahora. Esta cantidad de dinero le permitirá  tener mayor capital de trabajo, ya que podrá comprar más animales y revender con ocasión de estas fiestas navideñas, en las cuales la demanda es más fuerte.
texts.en:
Guisela is 26 years old and lives with her 6 year old son and her mother. She sells animals, cattle and sheep, in the main livestock fairs of the area. She is very happy because for the past 4 years she has dedicated herself to this activity, which allows her to support her young son who is the reason for all her efforts. With him in mind, she never tires of searching for the best animals which will guarantee her greater profits. When there are no sales, she cares for her animals in the barn for a few days and tries to fatten them up, because she depends on them for her livelihood. This is the second time Guisela is asking for a loan from MFP, and she commits to continue repaying punctually as she has always done thus far. This loan will allow her to have more working capital, and she will be able to buy more animal and resell them for special occasions such as these Christmas holidays, when demand is at its peak.

Translated from Spanish by Laure Kwon, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: To increase the number of animals she can buy

loans.name: Herenia

texts.es: Herenia tiene 20 años, vive con sus padres. Nació en una familia dedicada a las tareas de la agricultura, siempre apoyó de manera activa a sus padres y ahora que se ha independizado, cría sus propios animales, también se dedica a las tareas agrícolas como parte del sostén que ella representa en su casa, es así que sale a vender sus animales los fines de semana en las ferias ganaderas. Su deseo es tener una economía sólida que le permita superarse a través del estudio y ser agradecida con sus padres por todo el apoyo que le han dado. Es la segunda vez que Hernia solicita un préstamo con MFP, y se compromete a ser, una vez más, puntual en sus cuotas. Con esta cantidad de dinero comprará un torete y de esta manera incrementará su capital de trabajo.
texts.en:
Herenia is 20 years old and lives with her parents. Born into a family dedicated to agriculture, she has always actively helped her parents and now has become independent, raising her own animals as well as farming as part of her contribution to the household. She sells her animals on weekends and at livestock fairs. Her wish is to have enough money to allow her to improve her situation through studies and is grateful to her parents for all the support they have given her. This is the second time that Herenia has requested a loan from MFP, and she is committed to once again repay the loan punctually. She will use the loan to buy a young bull and increase her working capital.

Translated from Spanish by Laure Kwon, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: To buy a young bull

loans.name: Luis Eusebio

texts.es: El Sr. Luís tiene 43 años de edad, habita en un barrio de la capital llamado 380, en la capital de Managua casado, sus hijos ya están mayores y son profesionales. Los planes que tiene para su familia es asegúrales un patrimonio mejor para su esposa y  hijos. Don Luís se desempeña como taxista desde hace siete  años, anteriormente trabaja como ejecutivo de venta y posteriormente adquirió un crédito para comprar su propio auto y trabajarlo. Sus planes en el ámbito económico es aumentar sus ingresos  comprando una nueva unidad de taxi dándolo a trabajar, en estos momentos necesita comprar llantas para el vehiculo y darle mantenimiento para poder ofrecer un buen servicio  a sus clientes. Agracias a los prestamos de Afodenic lograra que su unidad de taxi  siga ofreciendo ingresos y un mejor servicio a sus pasajeros. Para nuestra empresa  es importante el desarrollo de nuestros clientes.
texts.en:
Luís is 43 years old, lives in a neighbourhood called 380 in the capital Managua. Married, his children are grown and are professionals. His plans for his family are to ensure a better inheritance for his wife and children. Luís has worked as a taxi driver for the past seven years; before that he worked as a salesman and prior to that he borrowed in order to buy his own car and work with it. His financial plans are to increase his income by buying another taxi and putting it to work. He will need to buy tires for the vehicle and perform maintenance on it in order to give his clients good service. Thanks to the loans from Afodenic, his taxi business continues to make good revenues and offer ever better service to his passengers. For us, the development of our clients is most important.

Translated from Spanish by Laure Kwon, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: To buy tires for the maintenance of a vehicle

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: Purchase of clothing and accessories to replenish a small store.

loans.name: Eric

texts.en:
Eric S. is a trader. He sells food in the market at Ntsiman near Elmina, and he also operates a corn mill.  His major challenge is fueling the milling machine. Eric is divorced with one child and received his education through senior high school.  

Eric has been selling food since 2006.  Eric intends to use his loan to buy more food to sell and also use part of his loan to invest in running his milling machine.  He will use the profits to pay for his child’s school fees, feed them both and also pay the utility bills. He will also use some of his profits to extend his business.

loans.use: Eric intends using the money given him to buy more foodstuffs to sell and also use part of the money to invest in the running of his milling machine.

loans.name: Zoraida Del Socorro

texts.es: La Sr. Zoraida tiene 43 años de edad, habitante del barrio memorial Sandino,  en la capital de Managua, madre soltera, con dos lindos hijos de 14 y 16 años de edad. Doña Zoraida trabaja como farmacéutica desde hace nueve años inicio como auxiliar farmacéutico y ahora se desempeña como responsable de farmacia en un centro.  Sus planes es mejorar su estilo de vida para que sus hijos tengan la comodidad necesaria. En ámbito laboral es seguir brindando buena atención y servicio a sus clientes y adquirir su propia farmacia,   con esta solicitud va a comprar materiales de construcción para  construir su casa ya que es muy sencilla e insegura, además es muy pequeña y desea hacer esas mejoras y otra modificaciones a su vivienda. Agracias a los préstamos de Afodenic lograr realizar la compra de materiales y brindarles seguridad, protección y un patrimonio a sus hijos.
texts.en:
Zoraida is 43 years old and lives in the neighbourhood of Sandino, in the capital Managua. She is a single mother of two beautiful children aged 14 and 16. Zoraida has worked as a pharmacist for the past nine years. She began as an assistant pharmacist and now serves as head pharmacist downtown. Her goals are to improve her lifestyle so that her children can have all the necessary comforts. She continues to provide good care to her customers at her workplace and wants to open her own pharmacy. She will use this loan to buy construction materials to improve her home as it is very simple and insecure as well as being very small, so much so that she needs to make improvements and other modifications to her house. She is grateful for Afodenic's loans for the purchase of materials and for providing security, protection and a heritage to her children.

Translated from Spanish by Laure Kwon, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: To buy construction materials to increase the size of her home.

loans.name: Georgina

texts.en:
Georgina Q. is a trader. She sells smoked fish and food stuff at Abreshia near Elmina, which she has been doing since 1988. She has received no formal education. She plans to use the money loaned to her to buy more fresh fish for processing and sale and also to increase her purchase of foodstuffs for resale at the market. 

She would then use her profits to cater for her children and their education.

loans.use: to buy more fresh fish for processing and sale and purchase of food stuffs for resale

loans.name: Rolando Antonio

texts.es: El Sr. Rolando tiene 55 años de edad,  habita en Laureles Sur, su esposa le tiene dos hijos de 16, 18 años de edad, los dos estudian la secundaria, y también en tiempos libres ayudada a sus padres con la elaboración del pan ya que su esposa también lo apoyado siempre y trabajan juntos, este negocio lo inicio hace diez años lo cual es una herencia de sus padres, ya que ellos hacían y vendían el productos de ricos y variados panes tanto dulce como simple, pues el ha seguido la tradición vende y lo elabora lo cual le genera a una buena ganancia, esta solicitud es la octava en Afodenic lo cual ha sido de buenos beneficios para su incrementos de inventario, como su producción en las ventas, lo que desea es invertir en materia prima, para producir mas pan, y así seguir ofertando sus productos a diversos proveedores.
texts.en:
Rolando is 55 years old, lives in Laureles Sur, and he and his wife have two children aged 16 and 18. Both of his children are in high school and help their parents during their free time with making bread as his wife also always supports him and they work together. He started his business ten years ago when he inherited it from his parents as they made and sold delicious products and various breads, both sweet and simple. He has continued the tradition and developed the business which generates good revenues. This is his eighth loan with Afodenic which has been of great benefit in increasing his inventory and sales production. He would like to invest in raw materials to make more bread and thus continue to offer his products to different suppliers.

Translated from Spanish by Laure Kwon, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: To buy products to make bread.

loans.name: Gladys

texts.en:
Gladys A. is a trader. She sells foodstuffs at Ntsiman near Elmina. She is married and has one child. Her husband is also a trader. She has received education through junior high school level. She has been trading since 2006. 

Gladys would use the money given her to buy more foodstuffs to sell and also make an oil palm plantation.

loans.use: to buy more foodstuffs to sell and also make an oil palm plantation.

loans.name: Claudia María

texts.es:
La señora Claudia María T. con mucho ahínco se dedica a su negocio de venta de mariscos en el mercado central de la ciudad de Chinandega de donde es originaria. Ella se ubica en el sector mariscos donde atiende a sus clientes ofreciendo diferentes tipos de pescados y otros mariscos.

La razón por la cual hoy en día ha buscado el apoyo en Ceprodel es para obtener un crédito para la compra de los mariscos y de esta forma contribuir al mejoramiento de su familia en su casa de habitación.
texts.en:
Ms. Claudia María T. works very eagerly in her seafood business in the central market of the city of Chinandega—her hometown. Her business is located in the seafood section, where she serves her customers, offering them different types of fish and other seafood.

The reason why she is seeking support from Ceprodel is that she needs to obtain a loan to purchase seafood and contribute to the betterment of her family in their household.

Translated from Spanish by Elizabeth Casian, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Purchase seafood

loans.name: Lina

texts.es: Lina tiene 57 años, vive con sus 2 hijos. Ella vende animales después de un tiempo de crianza, donde los mantiene con una dieta balanceada para que los animales estén gordos y de esta manera ver las utilidades de su venta, desde hace más de 30 años Lina se viene dedicando a esta actividad que le permite  tener los ingresos necesarios para vivir y apoyar a sus hijos en sus estudio. Ella se siente muy contenta de realizar esta labor, ya que lo disfruta y quiere seguir adelante con ella, además, ordeña cada día a sus vacas para vender 20 litros diarios a las compañías de productos lácteos, así seguirá esforzándose, sobre todo para apoyar a la última de sus hijas que está estudiando. Es la segunda vez que Lina solicita un préstamo con MFP, y ha demostrado puntualidad en sus pagos de devoluciones. Esta cantidad la utilizará en la compra de un becerro, para aumentar el número de su ganado.
texts.en:
Lina is a 57-year-old woman who lives with her 2 children. She sells livestock after raising them for a period of time, when she keeps the animals on a balanced diet so that they can be fat. Thus, she can see profits from selling them. For over 30 years, Lina has been in this business, which has allowed her to have the income necessary to survive and support her children’s studies. She feels very content working in this field because she enjoys it and wants to continue with it. Furthermore, she milks her cows every day so that she can sell 20 liters a day to the dairy product companies. She will keep making an effort this way, above all to support her youngest daughter, who is currently in school. This is the second time that Lina requests a loan from MFP, and she has demonstrated punctuality in her repayments. She will use this loan to purchase a calf, thus increasing her number of cattle.

Translated from Spanish by Elizabeth Casian, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Purchase a calf

loans.name: Juana Francisca

texts.es:
El negocio al que se dedica la señora Juana J. es a la venta de calcomanías comercializadas en su propio tramo en la ciudad de Chinandega en el mercado central. A este negocio le ha dedicado 14 años de su vida y estas calcomanías son usadas por lo general en los automóviles.

Debido a que ya casi se le agotan las calcomanías, requiere comprar más para comercializarlas y para esto ha solicitado un préstamo en Ceprodel para lograr comprar dichos productos y así ofrecerlos en su sector en el mercado de Chinandega.
texts.en:
Ms. Juana J. sells decals in the Central Market of the city of Chinandega. She has been in business for 14 years of her life, and these decals are generally used on automobiles.

Because she is close to running out of decals, she needs to purchase more, which is why she is requesting a loan from Ceprodel so that she can sell the aforesaid products in her area in the market of Chinandega.

Translated from Spanish by Elizabeth Casian, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Purchase decorative decals

loans.name: Karla Patricia

texts.es: Doña Karla tiene 24 años de edad, habita en un barrio que se llama Laureles Norte en la capital de Managua, tiene dos hijos de 8 y 10 años años de edad,  los dos los tiene estudiando la primaria en el colegio del barrio, su esposo se desempeña como pintor automotriz, y su negocio de ella es la venta de ropa desde hace cuatro años, inicio con prestamos en bancos comunales, y hasta ahora he salido adelante con mi negocio la dificultad es cuando esta malas las ventas, oh cuando me quedo con poco inventario, esta es mi cuarta solicitud en afodenic lo cual ha sido de gran beneficio para mi familia ya que hemos podido hacer mejoras a nuestra casa, con este préstamo voy a cambiar el techo que esta en mal estado. A futuro es poder tener una tienda grande de ropa y calzado.
texts.en:
Ms. Karla J. is a 24-year-old woman who lives in a neighborhood called Laureles Norte in the capital city of Managua. She has two children, ages 8 and 10, who both attend the neighborhood school. Her husband works in auto painting, and she has had a clothing business for four years. She started her business with loans from microfinance institutes, and up to now she has moved her business forward. The problem is when sales are down, or when she is left with only a small inventory. This is her fourth loan request with Afodenic, which has greatly benefited her family since that have been able to make home improvements. With this loan, she will replace the roof, which is in disrepair. In the future, she would like to have a big clothing and footwear store.

Translated from Spanish by Elizabeth Casian, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Purchase construction materials to replace roof

loans.name: Estelbina Del Socorro

texts.es:
Estelbina S. se dedica a laborar en su tramo donde prepara alimentos para su venta en el mercado Central de la ciudad de Chinandega. Se ha caracterizado por elaborar deliciosos alimentos que son comercializados con mucho empeño y como resultado atiende varios clientes en su sector. 

La única razón por la cual ella ha buscado hoy en día el apoyo en Ceprodel es para la compra de la materia prima para elaborar los alimentos. Es por este motivo que solicita un crédito en Ceprodel esperando que su crédito sea otorgado y de esta forma continuar en su actividad preparando los deliciosos alimentos.
texts.en:
Estelbina S. prepares food that she sells in the Central Market of the city of Chinandega. She has made a name for herself by preparing delicious meals that she then sells with much determination. Consequently, she serves several customers in her area.

The only reason why she is now seeking Ceprodel’s support is that she needs to purchase more ingredients to prepare her meals. For this reason, she is requesting a loan from Ceprodel, hoping that she will be given a loan so that she can continue with her business of making delicious meals.

Translated from Spanish by Elizabeth Casian, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Purchase ingredients

loans.name: Lissi

texts.es: Lissi tiene 28 años, vive con su esposo y su hijo. Desde su niñez trabaja ayudando a sus padres en las tareas ganaderas, hace más de 5 años se independiza para formar una nueva familia al lado de su esposo, adquirió sus propios animales, aprovecha la venta de leche, así como vender los fines de semana en la feria ganadera los animales y obtener ganancias mensuales. Esta actividad le ha permitido capitalizar y junto a su esposo adquirir un automóvil  para que él se dedique al transporte y así incrementar los ingresos necesarios porque entre sus planes está obtener un propio terreno para construir su casa. Es la segunda vez que Lissi solicita un préstamo con MFP, y ha cumplido en el ciclo anterior fielmente con sus cuotas de pago. Con esta cantidad comprará una animal más (toro pequeño) y también 2 llantas para el carro de su esposo, ya que es un negocio familiar.
texts.en:
Lissi is 28 years old and lives with her husband and child. Since her childhood, she has helped her parents with livestock work. More than five years ago, she became independent and started a new family with her husband. She acquired her own animals and began selling milk and then animals at the weekend livestock fairs to earn her monthly wages. This activity has permitted her and her husband to get an automobile so he can work in transport and further increase their wages. One of their plans is to obtain their own land to construct a house. This is the second time that Lissi has sought a loan with MFP, and in the previous cycle she made all her repayments faithfully. With this loan she will buy one more animal (a small bull) and two tires for her husband's car, as it is a family business.

Translated from Spanish by Trisha Bury, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Purchase a bull

loans.name: Silvio Antonio

texts.es:
Silvio M. es un caballero de edad de 36 años que se dedica al negocio de taller de reparacion de joyas como prendas, anillos, aretes, cadenas entre otras.Atiende en la ciudad de Chinandega donde tiene su propio establecimiento con las herramientas necesarias y una lampara que le ilumina muy de cerca para realizar bien los trabajos. Es padre de dos hijos en edad escolar al cual tiene que mantener y brindarles todas las condiciones necesarias para su desarrollo. 

Hoy en día atraviesa una necesidad y es que requiere adquirir mejores herramientas para llevar a cabo el trabajo y es por este motivo que busca el apoyo en Ceprodel para obtener el crédito para la compra de dichas herramientas para continuar en su  negocio.
texts.en:
Silvio M. is a 36-year-old gentleman with a jewelry business in the city of Chinandega. He repairs jewelry and at the same time performs requested work on these gems. He is the father of two school-aged children, and must provide them with everything they need for their development.

Now he needs new tools to carry out his work, and this has motivated him to seek help from Ceprodel in getting a loan to buy these tools and continue his business.

Translated from Spanish by Trisha Bury, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Purchase tools

loans.name: María

texts.es: María tiene 53 años y vive con su esposo. Hace 4 años tomó una decisión importante para la economía de su familia, compró un camión, decisión que ahora le permite tener una estabilidad económica, con la movilidad que posee recoge toda la arena necesaria de la rivera del río y la vende por camionada, para eso contrata a peones que le ayuden a cargar la arena. Hasta el momento, considera que le está yendo bien, por lo cual en sus planes futuros está el de tener su propio almacén, para que siempre tenga disponible estos materiales para la venta, María está muy motivada por la ganancia que genera esta actividad. Es la segunda vez que solicita un préstamo con MFP, y ha demostrado puntualidad en el pago de sus cuotas de devolución. Esta cantidad le servirá para invertir en el cambio de motor de su camión, de gasolina a petróleo.
texts.en:
María is 53 years old and lives with her husband. Four years ago, she made an important decision for her family's finances and bought a truck, which now allows her to have economic stability. She uses the mobility of her truck to gather sand from the riverbanks and sell it, and hires laborers to help her load the sand. So far, this has been going well, but her future plans include owning her own warehouse so these materials are always available for sale. María is very motivated by the wages this work generates. This is the second time she has sought a loan from MFP, and she has demonstrated punctuality in her repayments. This loan will be invested to switch her truck's engine from gas to diesel.

Translated from Spanish by Trisha Bury, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Change the engine of the truck used for business

loans.name: Maynor Francisco

texts.es:
En el Mercado central de la ciudad de Chinandega, el joven Maynor F. se dedica a laborar en la venta de discos compactos como lo es música y películas las cuales las comercializa en su pequeño tramo donde atiende a sus clientes.

El joven Maynor se ha caracterizado por ser muy emprendedor y haber montado este negocio desde hace 4 años y hoy en día a su edad de 24 años son sus anhelos crecer en el negocio y ampliarse en su localidad. La razón por la que solicita el crédito en Ceprodel es para la compra de los discos compactos con el propósito de comercializarlos en su negocio.
texts.en:
Maynor F. sells CDs and DVDs in a small stall in Chinandega's central market. Although a young man, Maynor is known for being very enterprising, and he has had this business for four years. Now, at 24 years of age, his dream is to expand his business and increase the size of his shop. He is asking for this loan from Kiva's partner CEPRODEL to buy compact discs to sell at his shop.

Translated from Spanish by Kris Vickery, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: To purchase compact discs

loans.name: Elizabeth

texts.es: Doña Elizabeth habita en Waspan Norte desde hace veinticinco años pues ahí nació, es casada y con dos hijos de 2 y 8 años de edad, uno de ello ya va a clase, su esposo trabaja en mecánica industrial, la Sra. Elizabeth vende cosméticos desde hace cinco años que comenzó con prestamos comunales, con esta solicitud de préstamo es para invertir en su negocio de cosméticos ya que para esta fecha le hacen muchos pedidos y las venta es buena, a largo plazo es poder captar mas clientes para mejorar sus ingresos y así crecer también en  capital.
texts.en:
Ms. Elizabeth C. has been living in Waspan Norte for 25 years as she was born there. She is a married mother with 2 children, ages 2 and 8, one of whom is already in school. Her husband works as an industrial mechanic, while she has been selling cosmetics for five years. She started her business with microloans. She will invest this loan in her cosmetics business because this is the season when she gets a lot of orders and sales increase. In the long run, she hopes to be able to attract more customers so that she can improve her earnings and make her financial resources grow.

Translated from Spanish by Elizabeth Casian, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Purchase assorted cosmetics and other beauty products

loans.name: Desireé Bravo Group

texts.es: EL GRUPO "DESIREE BRAVO" ESTA REPRESENTADO POR LA SEÑORA SUSAN ES UN GRUPO DIVERSO EN LAS ACTIVIDADES QUE REALIZAN COMO A LA VENTA RE COMIDA, ROPA, ZAPATOS, DETERGENTES Y AL SERVICIO D. TRANSPORTE PÚBLICO,  A PESAR D. SU DIVERSAS SON UN GRUPO BIEN UNIDO Y RESPONSABLE. LOS SOCIOS (AS) SABEN D. QUE EN EL RUBRO EN EL QUE SE ENCUENTRAN EXISTE MUCHA COMPETENCIA PERO ELLOS YA TIENE CLIENTES FIJOS Y SABEN COMO SALIR ADELANTE GRACIAS A LA EXPERIENCIA QUE D. LOS AÑOS QUE LLEVAN EN EL RUBRO. EL DESTINO DEL FINANCIAMIENTO ES PARA LA COMPRA D. MATERIALES Y A LA MEJORA D. SUS HERRAMIENTAS D. TRABAJO. ELLOS (AS) NO TIENEN MUCHA EXPERIENCIA CON GRUPOS SOLIDARIOS PERO SON GENTE RESPONSABLE Y MUY CAPAZ. SE ACLARA QUE EL SEÑOR JESUS NO SE ENCUENTRA EN LA FOTO PERO SU ESPOSA FUE EN REPRESENTACION SUYA.
texts.en:
The “Desiree Bravo” Group, represented by Ms. Susan S., is a group comprised of members who partake in different business activities, such as food, clothing, footwear and detergent sales, and public transportation services. Despite their diversity, they are a very united and responsible group. The members realize that there exists a lot of competition in this field, but they already have a fixed clientele and they know how to get ahead thanks to the years of experience that they possess in their businesses. They will use this loan to purchase supplies and improve their work tools. They have not had much experience with solidarity groups, but they are very capable and responsible people. Mr. Jesus is not pictured, but his wife is here on his behalf.

Translated from Spanish by Elizabeth Casian, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Work capital

loans.name: Mirna Del Rosario

texts.es: Doña Mirna tiene 56 años de edad, habita en un barrio de la capital de Managua que se llama Laureles Norte, es madre soltera y con dos hijos que son independiente, la Sra. Mirna vende Medicina botánica desde hace cinco años, medicamento que la gente ahora compra mucho, inicio con una liquidación anterior de su trabajo, con esta solicitud es la séptima la cual va invertir en comprar medicamentos, para revender y obtener ingresos, estos prestamos han sido de mucho beneficios para su negocio, a largo plazo es tener mas clientela y brindar otros servicios.
texts.en:
Ms. Mirna O. is a 56-year-old woman who lives in a neighborhood called Laureles Norte in the capital city of Managua. She is a single mother with two independent children. Ms. O. has been selling herbal medicine, which people purchase a lot of nowadays, for five years. She started her business with the severance pay from her previous job. This is her seventh loan request, which she will invest in purchasing medication that she will then resell for a profit. These loans have been very beneficial for her business. In the long run, she hopes to increase her clientele and offer other services.

Translated from Spanish by Elizabeth Casian, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Purchase herbal medicine

loans.name: Urkupiña Group

texts.es: El grupo "Urkupiña" esta representado por la señora Caren en general las socias cursan el cuarto ciclo con la fundación demostrando puntualidad y responsabilidad en sus pagos son gente emprendedora y muy honesta. la mayoría D. los socios (as) se dedican a la venta D. ropa, cosméticos, comida y actividades como manicuritas, peinadora y los varones al transporte público, son gente que con los año aprendió a competir con en el mercado en el que trabajan por lo que siempre han podido salir adelante con la colaboración D. sus familias ya que todos trabajan para ayudar en los trabajos D. los socio (as). El crédito financiado servirá para la compra D. mercaderías e insumos para estocar mejor sus puestos D. venta. Los socios (as) conocen bien la forma D. trabajo con grupos solidarios ya que en anteriores ciclos demostraron responsabilidad y puntualidad con la fundación Agrocapital.
texts.en:
The “Urkupiña” group is represented by Ms. Caren L.. The members are in their fourth loan cycle with the foundation, demonstrating punctuality and responsibility with their repayments. They are very honest and enterprising people. Some members are involved in selling clothing, cosmetics, or food, while others proviD. services as manicurists and hairstylists. The men of the group work in public transportation. They are people who have learned to compete in the market over the years because they help each other out. The loan will be used to purchase merchandise and supplies in order to better stock their sales booths. The members understand how to work in solidarity groups because in their previous loan cycles, they have demonstrated responsibility and punctuality with Fundación Agrocapital.

Translated from Spanish by Elizabeth Casian, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Work capital

loans.name: El Sol Group

texts.es: EL GRUPO " EL SOL" ESTA REPRESENTADO POR LA SEÑORA ANGÉLICA, ESTA CONFORMADO POR GENTE QUE RESIDEN EN EL MISMO BARRIO POR LO QUE SE CONOCEN ENTRE SI D. BARIOS AÑOS ATRÁS. TODOS LOS SOCIOS (AS) TIENE PEQUEÑOS PUESTOS D. VENTA D. ABARROTES, COMIDA, COSMÉTICOS, PAN Y ALGUNAS SE DEDICAN AL SERVICIO D. LIMPIEZA. COMO EN TODO EL RUBRO COMERCIAL SIEMPRE EXISTE LA OFERTA Y LA DEMANDA D. PRODUCTOS PERO CON LOS AÑOS LOS SOCIOS (AS) HAN ADQUIRIDO EXPERIENCIA EN VENTAS POR LO QUE SABEN QUE PODRÁN SALIR ADELANTE ANTE CUALQUIER PROBLEMA QUE SE AVECINE. EL DESTINO DEL FINANCIAMIENTO OTORGADO POR LA FUNDACIÓN AGROCAPITAL ES PARA LA COMPRA D. PRODUCTOS E INSUMOS PARA ESTOCAR SUS PUESTOS D. VENTA Y MEJORAR LA CALIDAD D. SUS PRODUCTOS. UNA MAYORÍA D. LOS SOCIOS (AS) TIENEN EXPERIENCIA EN GRUPOS SOLIDARIOS PERO ES LA PRIMERA VEZ QUE TRABAJAN BAJO ESTA MODALIDAD CON LA FUNDACIÓN AGROCAPITAL, ELLOS ASEGURAN SER GENTE HONRADA, RESPONSABLE Y CUMPLIDA POR LO QUE SE LES OTORGA LA OPORTUNIDAD D. MEJORAR LA CALIDAD D. VIDA D. LOS SOCIOS (AS) Y D. SUS FAMILIAS.
texts.en:
The “El Sol” group, represented by Ms. Angelica B., is comprised of residents of the same neighborhood, which means that they have all known each other for many years. The members own small stands and sell groceries, fast food, cosmetics and bread. Some members have their own cleaning service. As in all commercial spheres, the law of supply and demand always comes into play, but over the years, the members have acquired experience in retail, which means that they know that they will overcome any problem that may arise. The loan from Fundación Agrocapital will be used to purchase products and supplies to restock their stands and improve the quality of their products. Most of the members have experience with solidarity groups, but this is the first time they work in this moD. with Fundación Agrocapital. They guarantee that they are honorable and responsible people, which is why they have been given the opportunity to improve both their quality of life and that of their families.

Translated from Spanish by Elizabeth Casian, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Work capital

loans.name: Janett Concepcion

texts.es:
La Sr. Janett tiene 44 años de edad, habitante de barrio Laureles sur en la capital de Managua, casada su esposo se desempeña como albañil, tiene tres preciosos hijos de 14, 21y 24 años de edad solo el menor estudia. Su trabajo en la actualidad es su pequeño negocio de un kiosco en un colegio de la capital vendiendo productos como gaseosa, fritanga desde hace cuatro  años.  Sus planes es terminar la construcción de su casa para ofrecerle seguridad y protección a su familia. ya que su vivienda es de zinc y desea comprar materiales de construcción como: piedra, cemento, arena, hierro, perlinez y otros para comenzar a construir, su anhelo es ver su casita terminada y digna
 En el ámbito económico captar nuevos clientes y comercializar nuevos productos, ampliar el kiosco. Gracias a los préstamos de Afodenic lograra que sus ventas aumenten y así brindarle un mejor nivel de vida a su familia.
texts.en:
Janett is 44 years old and a resident of the South Laureles district of the capital, Managua. She is married and her husband works as a mason. They have three lovely children, ages 14, 21 and 24; only the youngest is still in school. For the past four years, Janett has worked in a small kiosk at a school in the capital, selling soft drinks and fritanga, a fried meal including meat and vegetables. Janett plans to finish the construction of her house in order to provide security and protection for her family. Since her house is made of zinc-coated corrugated metal sheets, Janett wants to buy construction materials such as stone, cement, sand, iron, roof purlins, etc., in order to start construction. Her dream is to see her home finished in an acceptable manner. Business-wise, she hopes to attract new customers, market new products and expand the kiosk. Thanks to loans from Afodenic, she will achieve an increase in sales, and thus provide a better standard of living for her family.

Translated from Spanish by Joyce ., Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Purchase of construction materials

loans.name: El Tiluchi Group

texts.es: EL GRUPO "EL TILUCHI" ESTA REPRESENTADO POR EL SEÑOR NELSON QUE AL IGUAL QUE SUS COMPAÑEROS RESID. EN EL MISMO BARRIO.  LOS SOCIOS (AS) SE ENCUENTRAN CURSANDO SU SEGUNDO CICLO POR LO QUE YA TIENEN EXPERIENCIA EN GRUPOS SOLIDARIOS Y CANCELARON EL CRÉDITO SIN MAYOR DIFICULTAD DEMOSTRANDO HONRADEZ Y RESPONSABILIDAD EN SUS PAGOS. EN GENERAL LOS SOCIOS SE DEDICAN A ACTIVIDADES COMO LA VENTA D. COMIDAS. ZAPATOS, COSMÉTICOS A LA ELABORACIÓN D. PAN Y REPOSTERÍA AL SERVICIO DOMESTICO Y AL TRANSPORTE PUBLICO. COMO EN TODO RUBRO COMERCIAL SIEMPRE EXISTE LA COMPETENCIA PERO EL OBJETIVO DEL GRUPO ES COMÚN, EL D. PROGRESAR EN SUS NEGOCIOS PARA MEJORAR LA CALIDAD D. VIDA D. SUS FAMILIAS. EL DESTINO DEL FINANCIAMIENTO ES PARA LA COMPRA D. INSUMOS Y PRODUCTOS ASÍ COMO PARA LA COMPRA D. HERRAMIENTAS D. TRABAJO Y LA MEJORA D. SUS NEGOCIOS. EN GENERAL LOS SOCIOS (AS) TIENEN EXPERIENCIA EN GRUPOS SOLIDARIOS PERO ES LA PRIMERA VES QUE TRABAJAN BAJO ESTA MODALIDAD CON LA FUNDACIÓN AGROCAPITAL.
texts.en:
The group, The Tiluchi, is represented by Mr. Nelson and the other group members, who all live in the same neighborhood. The group members are in their second cycle, so they already have experience in these types of groups and have paid back other loans without difficulty, thus demonstrating honor and responsibility with their payments. In general, the members do things such as sell food, shoes, and makeup, bake bread and pastries, proviD. domestic service, and proviD. public transportation. As always in commerce, there is competition, but the group has a common goal: to advance in their businesses to improve the quality of life of their families. This loan will be used to purchase items and products needed to improve services. In general, the members have experience in these sorts of groups, but this is the first time that they have used this method with Kiva partner Fundacion Agrocapital.

Translated from Spanish by Olivia Engkvist, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Operating expenses

loans.name: Rosa Patricia

texts.es:
La Sr. Rosa tiene 29 años de edad, es casada su esposo es albañil, habita en el barrio Laureles sur en la capital de Managua, tiene dos hijas de 8 y 10 años de edad,  ambas estudian y ayudan a su madre.  Trabaja como inspectora en una textil era desde hace cuatro  años. Sus planes es educar a sus hijas y ofrecerle un mejor sistema de vida dándole mayor seguridad y comodidad a su familia realizando mejoras en su hogar. Con la solicitud del préstamo la quiere para 
Realizar  compra de materiales de construcción como: cemento, hierro, bloques, y otros. Gracias a los préstamos de Afodenic lograra ofrecerle a su pequeña familia seguridad y protección y casa digna
texts.en:
Rosa is 29 years old and married. Her husband works in construction. She lives in the South Laureles neighborhood in the capital, Managua. She has two daughters, 8 and 10 years old, both of whom attend school and help their mother. She has worked as an inspector in a textile factory for four years. Her plans are to educate her daughters and offer them a better way of life, giving her family more security and comfort by improving her home. She wants to use the requested loan to buy constuction materials such as cement, iron, bricks, etc. Thanks to loans from Kiva partner Afodenic, she will be able to offer her small family security and protection, as well as a proper home.

Translated from Spanish by Olivia Engkvist, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Buy construction materials to fix up her house

loans.name: Candelaria Group

texts.es: El grupo "Candelaria" esta representado por el señor Reynaldo, en general los socios (as) se dedican al comercio de productos como ropa deportiva, abarrotes, juguetes, pollo, pan, comida, dulces y al transporte público. la competencia en le mercado es fuerte pero ellas saben como salir adelante por la experiencia y la calidad humana que cada uno de los socios (as) tiene. El destino del crédito financiado por la fundación Agrocapital es para la compra de insumos y productos para estocar sus puestos de venta para la época navideña que es cuando mayor venta de productos hay, alguno de los socios destinara sus fondos a la reparación y mejora de sus puestos de trabajo. Es la primera vez que trabajan con la fundación agrocapital pero ya tienen experiencia con grupos solidarios por lo que saben administrar bien los fondos que se les otorga para el beneficio de sus familias.
texts.en:
The group, Candelaria **, is represented by Mr. Reynaldo. In general the group members sell products such as athletic clothing, groceries, toys, chicken, bread, food, and sweets, as well as provide public transport. The competition in the market is strong, but the group members know how to rise above it because of their experience and personal qualities. This loan, financed through Kiva partner Fundacion Agrocapital, will be used for the purchase of items and products to stake out the members' places of business for the Christmas season, which is when the most sales take place. Some of the group members will use their funds to repair and improve their workplaces. This is the first time that the group has worked with Kiva partner Fundacion Agrocapital, but the members already have experience working in these types of groups, so they know how to use their funds well to benefit their families. ** Translator's note: "Candelaria" is the name of a religious festival held on February 2 in honor of the Virgen Mary. It is celebrated with candle processions in the churches.

Translated from Spanish by Olivia Engkvist, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Operating expenses

loans.name: Clarial Angeles

texts.es:
La señora Clarial P. se dedica al negocio de venta de ropa y calzados en su propio establecimiento en el Mercado central de la ciudad de Chinandega donde desde muy tempranas horas de la mañana abre el establecimiento ofreciendo ropa para caballeros, damas y niños con diferentes estilos y diferentes tamaños.

Hoy en día ella espera la respuesta de Ceprodel por la razón de que ha solicitado un crédito para la compra de la mercadería y muy confiadamente asegura que su crédito será otorgado de inmediato para proceder a la compra de la ropa brindada por sus proveedores.
texts.en:
Mrs. Clarial P. works selling clothing and shoes in her store in the central market of the city of Chinandega where she opens early every morning to offer various styles and sizes of clothing for men, women, and children. Today, she is hoping to receive a loan from Ceprodel in order to purchase additional merchandise. She is confident that she will receive the loan quickly to be able to purchase the clothing from her suppliers.

Translated from Spanish by Scott Crandall, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Purchase of merchandise

loans.name: Genaro Rafael

texts.es:
En el Mercado central de la ciudad de Chinandega el señor Genaro O. se dedica a su labor de alquiler de teléfono y venta de tarjetas celulares ubicados a la intemperie pero con la esperanza de llegar a tener su propio tramo donde atender a los clientes.

Es importante destacar que é les padre soltero y debe atender a su péqueña hija brindándole las condiciones necesarias para que se desarrolle en sus estudios de primaria. La razón por la que espera en Ceprodel es para obtener un crédito que le permita la compra de tarjetas telefónicas para su venta y además para el pago de las recargas electrónicas de celular.
texts.en:
In the central market of the city of Chinandega, Mr. Genaro O. works renting a telephone and selling cell phone cards; he currently operates his business out in the open but hopes to someday have his own shop where he can attend to his customers. It is important to highlight that he is a single father who takes care of his small daughter and tries to offer her the best conditions possible to develop through her schoolwork. He hopes to receive a loan from Ceprodel that will help him buy phone cards to sell and to pay for the cell phone electronic recharges.

Translated from Spanish by Scott Crandall, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Purchase of cell phone cards to sell

loans.name: Amigas Por Siempre Group

texts.es: El grupo "Amigas por Siempre" se encuentra en su segundo ciclo representados por la señora Edith Julia han demostrado responsabilidad y cumplimiento en su anterior ciclo teniendo experiencia en grupos solidarios. En general los socios (as) se dedican a la venta de electrodomésticos, ropa, zapatillas deportivas, mochilas, comestibles, peluches y los varones a la prestación de servicios y al transporte público. Los socios (as) saben que el mercado es amplio y que la competencia es grande pero los años de experiencia les han demostrado que cuando se tiene dedicación y constancia al negocio siempre se sale adelante. El destino del financiamiento otorgado por la fundación Agrocapital es para la compra de productos e insumos para estocar sus comercios con material de buena calidad y para la reparación de sus herramientas de trabajo.
texts.en:
The group Amigas por Siempre (Friends Forever) is in their second loan cycle and are represented by Mrs. Edith Julia; they have demonstrated responsibility and accomplishment in their previous cycle as they have had experience with support groups before. In general, the members work selling appliances, clothing, athletic shoes, backpacks, food, and toys and the men work in service or public transport businesses. The group members know that the market is large and there is a lot of competition, but years of experience have taught them that dedication and consistency help businesses to continue to grow. The loan from the Agrocapital Foundation will help them purchase products and ingredients to stock their businesses with high quality materials and to repair their tools.

Translated from Spanish by Scott Crandall, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Working capital

loans.name: Leonsio Moises

texts.es: El Sr. Leonsio Moises esta solicitando su 6to refinanciamiento para invertirlo en  mejora de su vivienda como es hecharle la ceramica a su vivienda y pintarla, trabaja como gerente de la CURACAO, tiene un bebe de 3 meses, su esposa se encarga de los quehaceres del hogar y del cuido del bebe, es importante  mencionar que este joven desde muy pequeño  ha trabajado y a apoyado a su mamá, a pesar que Leonsio ya no vive con su mamá siempre sigue al pendiente de ella, son una familia que profesan la religión evangelica, es un Joven con mucha responsabilidad, honesto, trabajador y muy querido por los pobladores de su  barrio, el se siente agradecido con AFODENIC ya que con los créditos anteriores logro terminar su casa y comprar sus electrodomésticos, aspira para este proximo año estudiar un post grado para vivir actualizado,  su sueño es tener trabajo para sacar a su hijo adelante y que a su familia no le falte nada y contar con buena salud.
texts.en:
Leonsio Moises is asking for his sixth loan to fix up his house by tiling and painting it. He is a manager of Curacao. He has a three-month-old baby, and his wife takes care of the chores around the house and cares for the child. It's important to mention that this young man has worked and supported his mother since he was very young. He does not live with his mother anymore, but he still devotes himself to her. The family is of the evangelical faith. Leonsio is a responsible, honest young man. He is a hard worker and much-loved by the people in his neighborhood. He is grateful to Kiva partner Afodenic for his previous loans that helped him finish (building) his house and purchase appliances. Next year, he hopes to do post-graduate studies to improve himself. His dream is to work so that his son will have a better life and so his family lacks nothing and always has good health.

Translated from Spanish by Olivia Engkvist, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Tile and paint the house

loans.name: Alberta

texts.es: Alberta tiene 54 años, vive con sus hijos y sus nietos. Siempre estuvo dedicada a la agricultura, pero ahora que ya es mayor se dedica a la venta de leña desde hace un año, negocio en el cual le va muy bien, sin tener que hacer mucho esfuerzo, aunque lo complicado es rajar las leñas, pero sus hijos y nietos le ayudan en este proceso, lo cual la tiene más tranquila. De la misma manera, se siente muy agradecida con sus clientes que vienen todas las mañanas  a comprar su leña, lo que la motiva a seguir trabajando para seguir apoyando a sus hijos y nietos en algunos gastos del hogar. Alberta inicio su crédito hace un año, ahora es su segundo préstamo con MFP,  y se muestra agradecida con la institución y trata siempre de corresponder con responsabilidad en sus pagos. Con el dinero solicitado incrementará la cantidad de leña que vende.
texts.en:
Alberta is 54 years old; she lives with her children and grandchildren. She always worked in agriculture, but now that she is older she has sold firewood for a year, a business that is going very well, without her having to put in much effort. However, it's hard for her to split the wood, but her children and grandchildren help her with this, so it makes her feel better. In the same way, she is very grateful for her customers who come every morning to buy her firewood, which motivates her to continue working to continue supporting her children and grandchildren with the household costs. Alberta received a loan a year ago; now this is her second loan with Kiva partner MFP. She is grateful to the organization and tries to always maintain her responsibility by making payments. With the requested money, she will increase the amount of firewood that she sells.

Translated from Spanish by Olivia Engkvist, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Increase the amount of firewood for sale

loans.name: Mabel Del Socorro

texts.es: La Sra. Mabel está solicitando su 1er crédito para invertirlo en mejora de su vivienda (construcción de una habitación), trabaja como Admistradora de crédito de la Curacao,  a que no tiene hijos ella ayuda a su abuelita con sus gastos familiares  y le compra los medicamentos que ella necesita ya que por su edad se mantiene enferma, su esposo trabaja como policía y le ayuda con los gastos familiares, vive en la zona # 2 de Nueva Guinea, actualmente Mabel esta estudiando una licenciatura en la Universidad URACAN Recinto Nueva Guinea, su sueño es seguir estudiando, tener trabajo y salud, y poco a poco ir mejorando su vivienda para tener mejor comodidad.
texts.en:
Mabel is requesting her first loan in order to invest in home improvements (a room addition). She works as a credit administrator for a home appliance and furniture store called La Curacao. As Mabel has no children, she helps her grandmother with living expenses and buys any medicine she needs because her grandmother is in poor health due to her age. Mabel’s husband is a police officer and helps support the family, and they live in zone two of Nueva Guinea. At present Mabel is studying for her degree at the Nueva Guinea campus of URACCAN University. Her dream is to continue her studies, have her work and health, and to gradually make home improvements so the house is more comfortable.

Translated from Spanish by Joyce ., Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Construction of an addition to the house

loans.name: Luciano Antonio

texts.es: El señor Luciano Antonio Martínez, tiene la edad de 66 años,  habita en el barrio reparto chic ubicado en la cuidad  de Managua, junto a su esposa y hijos, este señor tiene un pequeña finca ubicado en los ríos en el municipio de Ticuantepe el cual con mucho esfuerzos ha logrado establecer cultivos, la mayor parte del tiempo pasa en su finca ya que esta pendiente de cada cosa que pueda ocurrir ; la esposa le apoya en la casa , don Luciano tiene a su cargo dos niñas las cuales estudian , los hijos mayores de don Luciano le ayudan con los gastos del hogar , los planes de él es mejorar las condiciones de vida para brindarle un futuro mejor , Don Luciano desde hace veinte años se dedica a la agricultura , con la solicitud del préstamo va  a comprar fertilizantes para poder aplicárselo al producción de piña, y así vender una buena producción a mayor costo
texts.en:
Mr. Luciano Antonio Martínez is 66 years old and lives in the Reparto Chic neighborhood, located in the city of Managua, with his wife and children. He has a small farm, which he has managed to cultivate after much effort, located near the rivers of the municipality of Ticuantepe. He spends the majority of his time on his farm because he is keeping watch over anything that may happen. His wife supports him in their household. Mr. Luciano has two school age daughters under his care. His older children help him with the household expenses. He plans on improving his family’s living conditions so that he can offer them a better future. Mr. Luciano has been working in agriculture for 20 years. With this loan, he will purchase fertilizers to use on his pineapple crops so that he can sell more produce at a higher cost.

Translated from Spanish by Elizabeth Casian, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Purchase fertilizer and pesticides for his crops

loans.name: Karla Vanessa

texts.es: La señora Karla Vanessa Saquería Hernández tiene la edad de 35 años habita en el barrio monimbo ubicado en el cuidad de Masaya, junto a su esposo, el cual trabaja para ayudarle con los gastos del hogar, el esposo de doña Karla trabaja como técnico, ellos tienen a su cargo dos hijos los cuales estudian su primaria; los planes para su familia es mejorar la casa para brindarle mejor condición de vida, ella se desempeña como responsable de suministros del MINSA, desde hace veintiún años , doña Karla necesita el apoyo de nuestra Financiera para comprar materiales de construcción como: piedra, arena, cemento, hierro y otros para comenzar a construir su casa y tener una vivienda digna para su familia
texts.en:
Ms. Karla Vanessa Saquería Hernández is 35 years old and lives with her husband, who helps her with the household expenses, in the Monimbo neighborhood, located in the city of Masaya. Karla’s husband works as a technician. They have 2 children who attend elementary school. This family plans to make home improvements in order to have better living conditions. She has been working in MINSA (Nicaragua’s Ministry of Health) for 21 years as the person who is in charge of supplies. Karla needs our institute’s help so that she can purchase construction materials like rocks, sand, cement, steel and other supplies so that they can begin building their house and have a decent dwelling for the family.

Translated from Spanish by Elizabeth Casian, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Purchase construction materials to build her house

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: Purchase of clothing and footwear to restock a small business.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To start a small business of selling used clothing in her neighborhood.

loans.name: Manuel Enrique

texts.es: Don Manuel esta solicitando su 3er refinanciamiento  con AFODENIC, para invertirlo en mejora de su vivienda, como es terminar de construir la cocina de su casa, trabaja como guarda de seguridad en la Escuela Rafaela Herrera en colonia la F. a  30 Km de Nueva Guinea, donde la población cada dia va creciendo mas, cuenta con la ayuda de su esposa, la cual trabaja como docente; Don Manuel también trabaja como agricultor en los dias libres,  y obtiene los productos basicos del consumo Nicaraguense, tiene 2 hijos, la niña de 18 años estudia su quinto año de educación secundaria y la hija  menor de 14 años estudia su segundo año  en la Escuela Rafaela Herrera, Manuel es un hombre de escasos recursos económicos que ha luchado por ir mejorando su vivienda  desde que la obtuvieron para tener un hogar digno para su familia que cumpla con las condiciones que la familia necesita y su deseo es que sus hijos estudien para ser alguien en la vida, tener salud y trabajo.
texts.en:
Mr. Manuel is requesting his third loan from AFODENIC so that he can invest in improving his home by finishing the construction of his kitchen. He works as a security guard in the Rafaela Herrera School in the district of F., 30 km from Nueva Guinea, where the population is growing every day. He counts on the help of his wife, who works as a teacher. Mr. Manuel also works as a farmer on his days off, and he gets basic Nicaraguan consumption goods. He has 2 children. His eighteen-year-old daughter is in her fifth year of secondary school, and his younger daughter is 14 years old and is in her second year at the Rafaela Herrera School. Manuel has limited financial resources and has fought to improve his home since his family got it so that they can have a dignified home that meets with the conditions that his family needs. He wants his children to study so that they can be someone in life, to be healthy, and to work.

Translated from Spanish by Avni Shah, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Construction of his kitchen

loans.name: Amancayas Group

texts.es: El grupo "Amancayas" esta representado por la señora Rosa. Todo el grupo está formado por personas que demostraron interés por las ventajas ofrecidas D. nuestra institución, gran parte D. los integrantes se dedica a la venta D. comida, venta D. refrigerio, cosmeticos, abarrotes y algunos se dedican a la educación pública y a la elaboración D. pan. los socios (as) saben que la competencia en el mercado es granD. en especial en sus rubros pero la experiencia les ha enseñado que pueden salir adelante con el apoyo D. instituciones como la Fundación agrocapital que siempre les da una mano para mejorar sus negocios y aumentar la diversidad D. sus productos. Los socios (as) tienen experiencia en grupos solidarios por experiencias en otras instituciones pero en la fundación Agrocapital es la primera vez. existe un parentesco familiar entre Percy Napoleon y Cinthia ambos son hermanos pero poseen ingresos independientes por lo que el grupo no se siente afectado.
texts.en:
The Amancayes ("Lillies") group is represented by Rosa. The group is maD. up of people who have shown an interest in the benefits of working with our institution. A majority of the group's members sell food items, chilled products, cosmetics, and groceries; other members work in public education or earn a living making bread. The members know that competition in the market is fierce, especially for their particular lines of work, but the experience has taught them that they can get ahead with help from institutions like Fundacion Agrocapital. The institution always lends a hand to help improve their businesses and increase the range of their products. The members have experience in similar groups but this is their first experience with Fundacion Agrocapital. Percy Napoleon and Cinthia are brother and sister but they have independent incomes so the group doesn't think it matters that they're related.

Translated from Spanish by Jere Wiseman, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Working capital.

loans.name: Susana Del Socorro

texts.es: La profesora Susana está solicitando su 7mo refinanciamiento para invertirlo en mejora de su vivienda, como es construir los servicios higienicos y reparar la cocina del hogar,  trabaja como docente de educación secundaria desde hace 21 años, es importante mencionar que Susana con los creditos anteriores otorgados por AFODENIC ha mejorado su vivienda y sus condiciones de vida, tiene 4 hijos, una mayor de edad, y 3 que tiene a cargo, la mayor trabaja como docente, el otro hijo estudia 5to año de educación secundaria, el otro hijo estudia 3 er año de educación y el hijo menor de 12 años estudia su quinto grado de educación primaria, es una mujer que sueña con tener un porvenir mejor y que sus hijos tengan siempre lo basico y que estudien para que lleguen a ser excelentes profesionales, desea tener trabajo y sobre todo estar bien con Dios.
texts.en:
Professor Susana is asking for refinancing of her seventh loan to invest in home improvements like building hygenic bathrooms and repairing her home's kitchen. She has worked as an teacher in secondary education for 21 years. It is important to mention that Susana, with previous loans provided by AFODENIC, has improved her home and her living conditions. She has 4 children, one is an adult and three that she still cares for. The oldest works as teacher, one son is in his fifth year of secondary school, one son is in his third year of schooling, and the youngest is 12 years-old and is in fifth grade. She is a woman who dreams of having a better future and for her chidlren to always have the basics and that they study to become excellent professionals. She wants to have work and, above all, be good with God.

Translated from Spanish by Joanna Silverman, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Construction of Hygenic Bathrooms

loans.name: Johana Elizabeth

texts.es: Johana esta solicitando su 4to refinanciamiento para invertirlo en  mejora de su vivienda como es construir una habiatación, labora como contador y docente en la Universidad URACCAN zona Urbana de  Nueva Guinea desde  hace 8 años, actualmente esta estudiando un post grado en Universidad URACCAN recinto Nueva Guinea, se caracteriza por ser humilde, responsable, honesta y con muncho deseos de superación personal y profesional, profesa la religión evangelica. Tiene un hijo de 8 añitos que estudia su tercer grado de educación primaria, viven en el barrio Linda Vista de Nueva Guinea donde la población cada dia crece mas,  su mayor sueño es tener estabilidad laboral, una vivienda bonita y que su hijo estudie para que sea persona de bien.
texts.en:
Johana is asking for a refinancing of her fourth loan to invest in improving her home by building a room. She has worked as an accountant and teacher in the urban zone of New Guinea at the URACCAN University for 8 years. Currently, she is doing post-graduate work at the Nueva Guinea campus of URACCAN University. She is humble, responsible, honest, and has many dreams of succeeding personally and professionally. She professes evangelical religion. She has an 8 year-old son who is in third grade. They live in the Linda Vista de Nueva Guinea neighborhood where the population grows more each day. Her greatest dream is to have job stability, a beautiful home, and for her child to study to have a better life.

Translated from Spanish by Joanna Silverman, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Construction of a room

loans.name: Alejandra

texts.es: Alejandra tiene 59 años, vive con sus hijas que son casadas. Tiene 20 años D. experiencia en el comercio independiente, y con los ingresos que ella proveía pudo sostener a su familia, en la actualidad se sostiene así misma, saliendo cada fin D. semana con su pequeño puesto en una esquina D. las calles más comerciales D. su localidad para ofrecer los ricos lechones, que son el disfrute D. las personas que acuden a consumir este platillo a base D. cerdo, ella está muy animada D. seguir adelante por lo que   también trabaja en las festividades locales para aprovechar la frecuencia D. personas. Este es su 4to préstamo con MFP, es por ello que sigue trabajando con su banco comunal, y  su mejor garantirá es la responsabilidad demostrada desD. hace más D. 4 años. Con el dinero solicitado podrá abastecerse D. los insumos básicos para la elaboración D. su platillo, comprará un cerdo entero, además, implementará su negocio con café y vino.
texts.en:
Alejandra is 59 years old, she lives with her married daughters. She has 20 years of experience in independent business, and with the income she’s provided she has supported the family, and currently she supports herself, going out each weekend with her small business on a busy commercial street corner in her neighborhood to sell delicious sucklings (baby pigs), that are the delight of people who come to eat this pork-based dish, she is very excited about moving forward, so she also works the local festivals taking advantage of the large numbers of people. This is her 4th loan with MFP, it is for this reason she keeps working with this local bank, the responsibility she’s demonstrated in over more than four years of lending is her best guarantee. With the money she’s requesting, she will be able to stock up on costly basics making her pork dish better, she will buy an entire pig, and in addition, she will augment the business with coffee and wine.

Translated from Spanish by Jo Longnecker, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Purchase ingredients to improve her pork dish

loans.name: Astrid

texts.es: Astrid tiene 45 años, vive con su esposo y sus 3 hijos. Hace un año que se dedica a vender ropa, sus clientes son sus amistades y vecinos de confianza, así solo cubre pedidos, empezó este negocio por medio de un préstamo que le otorgaron que le fue muy beneficioso, ahora sigue manejando su capital con tendencia a crecer, para ello va de casa en casa ofreciendo sus prendas, así conoce a sus clientes, su proyecto es seguir creciendo y ampliar su mercadería, para Astrid el mejor regalo de su negocio es la amistad que entabla con sus clientes, la cual la empuja a seguir dedicándose a ello. Es la primera vez que solicita un préstamo con MFP, por lo que se compromete a ser puntual en los pagos correspondientes. Esta cantidad será el impulso para viajar a la ciudad de Lima, y comprar al por mayor, diversas prendas de vestir para dama.
texts.en:
Astrid is 45 years old, she lives with her husband and her 3 children. A year ago she began selling clothing, her customers are her friends and trusted neighbors, she alone takes requests, she began this business with the help of funding that she found was very beneficial, now she wants to grow the business more, she goes house to house selling her clothes, as she knows her customers, her intention is to keep growing and expanding her merchandise, for Astrid the best gift of her business is the engaging friendships she’s established with her customers, which inspires her to continue working hard for the business. This is the first time she’s asked for a loan with MFP, she commits to making payments on time. This amount will give her the chance to travel to the city of Lima and buy wholsale, diverse women’s clothing.

Translated from Spanish by Jo Longnecker, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Travel to the city of Lima to buy new clothing

loans.name: Belisa

texts.es: Belisa tiene 31 años, vive con sus padres. Hace 7 años, en busca de mejores oportunidades de desarrollo para ella misma y para sus padres, decidió  vender cosméticos por catálogo, con este negocio ella puede disponer de sus propios gastos, por lo que se siente satisfecha con la labor que realiza. Belisa se ha puesto como meta personal crecer más y tener su propio puesto de ventas, por el momento  está ofreciendo a personas conocidas y caminando de casa en casa para adquirir nuevas clientas. Es la primera vez que está solicitando un préstamo con MFP, por lo que se compromete a  ser puntual en sus pagos. Con esta cantidad Belisa podrá adquirir más cosméticos e incrementar sus ventas en esta  época navideña, comprara perfumes y joyas, así como también lápices labiales.
texts.en:
Belisa is 31 years old, living with her parents. Seven years ago, in search of better opportunities for development herself and for her parents, she decided to sell cosmetics by catalogue, and with this business she can have her own spending money, and be satisfied by the work she’s accomplishing. Belisa has set a personal goal to grow the business more and have her own shop, for the time being she’s selling to people she knows and going house to house to acquire new clients. This is the first time she’s solicited a loan with MFP, for which she commits to being punctual in her repayments. With this amount, Belisa will be able to buy more cosmetics and increase her sales during the Christmas season, she will by perfumes and jewelry, as well as lipsticks.

Translated from Spanish by Jo Longnecker, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Increasing cosmetic sells

loans.name: Elizavet

texts.es: Elizavet tiene 47 años, vive con sus hijos. Desde hace 3 años decidió vender cosméticos, debido a que una amiga que la animó a seguir adelante a pesar de los problemas económicos, es así que cada día trabaja  caminando de casa en casa ofreciendo sus productos, nunca cesa de caminar para conseguir nuevas clientas, siempre en busca de contactos de confianza para obtener ganancias, por el record de ventas puede tener incentivos de la línea de cosméticos que ella ofrece, de esta manera Elizavet sostiene a sus hijos que están pequeños todavía. Es la segunda vez solicita un préstamo con MFP, por lo que ha demostrado ser puntual. La cantidad solicitada será invertida en la compra de cosméticos, además, en esta época navideña comprará al por mayor prendas de vestir para vender.
texts.en:
Elizavet is 47 years old and lives with her children. 3 years ago she decided to sell cosmetics as a friend of hers inspired her to continue on in spite of economic problems, so every day she worked walking from house to house offering her products. She never stopped walking to obtain new customers, always seeking additional contacts to obtain earnings. Because of her sales record she can have incentives from her cosmetic line that she offers, and in this way Elizavet supports her children who are still young. This is the second time she is seeking a loan with MFP, and she has shown to be punctual. The loan will be invested in the purchase of cosmetics, in addition during this Christmas season she will buy at wholesale clothing items to sell.

Translated from Spanish by Cindy Kendall, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Buy cosmetics and clothing to sell

loans.name: Nancy

texts.es: Nancy tiene 44 años, vive con su esposo y sus 4 hijos. Casi toda su vida se ha dedicado a las tareas agrícolas, siembra los principales productos de su región, en este tiempo ha visto la ganancia de muchos años, pero también las pérdidas por los cambios climáticos bruscos y ahora trabaja con mucha dedicación en escoger las semillas, trabajo previo a la siembra, lo bueno es que cuando cosecha siempre hay personas que le compran al por mayor casi toda su cosecha, también cría animales que son otra buena opción de generar ingresos económicos cuando está esperando la época de cosecha, de esta manera solventa los gastos de su familia, más que nada de sus hijos quienes están estudiando y se necesita de todo ese ingreso para cubrir sus gastos. Es la segunda vez que Nancy está solicitando un préstamo con MFP, la primera vez demostró ser puntual en sus pagos. Esta cantidad de dinero será invertida en la compra de abono para sus tierras de cultivo y también un torete.
texts.en:
Nancy is 44 years old and lives with her husband and 4 children. She has been a farmer for most of her life, growing the primary products of her region. Over the years she has seen profits but also losses due to abrupt weather changes. Now she is working with great dedication to select the seeds, a job to be done prior to planting. The good thing is that when she harvests there are always people that purchase almost her entire harvest from her at wholesale. She also raises animals that are a good option to generating income while waiting for the harvest. In this way she can meet her family’s expenses, above all her children’s education expenses and she needs to use this income to cover her expenses. This is the second time Nancy is asking for a loan with MFP, and she was punctual with her payments on her first loan. This quantity of money will be invested in purchasing fertilizer for the land where she grows her crops and also in a young bull.

Translated from Spanish by Cindy Kendall, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Buy fertilizer and a young bull

loans.name: Yolanda

texts.es: Yolanda tiene 49 años, vive con su esposo y sus 2 hijos. Cada día trabaja para tener buenos resultados en la feria ganadera, se levanta a las 5 a de la mañana para cortar el pasto que comerán sus animales, se dedica a las tareas del campo desde hace 5 años atrás, aprovechando las extensiones de tierra que posee y que le permite tener sus animales y sembrar alfalfa para su alimentación. Los fines de semana, Yolanda se dirige a la feria ganadera de su localidad para venderlos, y ahora tiene deseos de trabajar  con más ahínco, porque sus 2 hijos están en edad escolar y hay necesidades que cubrir. Es la segunda vez que solicita un préstamo con MFP, y el motivo de renovar su crédito se debe a la puntualidad mostrada en el ciclo anterior. Con esta cantidad comprará más animales para incrementar su capital de trabajo.
texts.en:
Yolanda is 49 years old and lives with her husband and 2 children. Every day she works to have good results in the livestock market. She gets up at 5 in the morning to cut the forage her animals will eat. She has worked on the farm for 5 years, taking advantage of the plots of land that she possesses thus enabling her to have her animals and grow alfalfa to feed her animals. On weekends Yolanda goes to the livestock market in her area to sell them, and now she eagerly wishes to work more because her 2 children are school-aged and there are expenses to cover. This is the second time she has asked for a loan through MFP, and she demonstrated punctuality in her first loan. With this loan she will buy more animals to increase her working capital.

Translated from Spanish by Cindy Kendall, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Increase the quantity of animals she sells

loans.name: Gonzalo

texts.es: Don Gonzalo  está solicitando refinanciamiento de su 6to crédito para invertirlo en mejora de su vivienda (Repellar y hecarle el piso a la vivienda), trabaja como Auxiliar de Emfermeria desde hace 18 años, tiene 2 hijos, el mayor tiene 5 añitos y la niña 2 añitos, su esposa trabaja  como docente, ambos comparten los gastos del hogar, ellos son una familia humilde que a pesar que los dos trabajan devengan salarios bajos, es por esta razón que solicitan este crédito para ir mejorando poco a poco su vivienda;es un hijo muy responsable de sus padres, siempre esta al pendiente de lo que ellos necesitan, vive en la zona urbana de Nueva Guinea. Don Gonzalo es un profesional  con alto espiritud de superación personal y laboral,  responsable,  que ama su trabajo y se siente orgulloso de ayudar a los enfermos que asisten al Hospital a pasar consultas, su sueño es estudiar el proximo año,  tener estabilidad, salud  y una vivienda  con mejores condiciones para su vivienda.
texts.en:
Gonzalo is requesting his sixth loan to invest in improving his home (replaster his walls and put in a new floor). He has worked as a nursing assistant for the past 18 years and has two children, ages 5 and 2. His wife is a teacher, and together they share household expenses. They are a humble family, and even though they both work their wages are low, which is why they are requesting this loan so they can keep on improving their home little by little. Gonzalo is a very responsible son to his parents; he's always providing them with what they need. He lives in an urban son in Nueva Guinea. Gonzalo has strong desire to better himself personally and professionally. He is responsible man who loves his job and feels proud to help the sick people he cares for in consultations at the hospital. His dream is to go to school next year and have stability, health and a home with a better quality of life.

Translated from Spanish by Marty Greenstein, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Replaster the walls and put a new floor in his home

loans.name: Maria Asuncion

texts.es: La señora Maria Hernández tiene la edad de 56años,  habita en el sector de la Francia numero uno  ubicado en municipio de Ticuantepe, junto a su esposo Y  hijas, su esposo  de la señora trabaja como transportista y le ayuda con los gastos de la casa al igual que sus hijas trabajan y aporta para los gastos del hogar, esta señora es comerciante y a la vez se dedica a la agricultura  desde hace treinta años la mayor dificultad que ha tenido es falta de financiamiento por lo cual no a sacado una producción muy buena por falta de insumos , los sueños de doña Maria es llegar a expandir sus cultivos para ayudarles a sus hijas y  brindarle un mejor  futuro .con esta solicitud va a comprar abonos y venenos para sus cultivo y lograr a si una buena producción, Por lo cual ella solicita la mano amiga de afodenic para obtener ferlitizantes necesarios a sus para sus cultivos.
texts.en:
Maria Hernández is 56 years old and lives in Ticuantepe along with her husband and daughters. Her husband works as a driver and helps her with household expenses, and her daughter also work and help with the bills. Maria is a merchant and at the same time has been making a living as a farmer for the past 30 years.
